rules: Never use pure black (#000000). Use Slate-950 (#020617).
Use Teal for money/salary data points.
Gradients should be subtle and used only for backgrounds or 'glass' borders, not main buttons.

visual_enhancers.tracing_beam: Use for 'Featured Jobs' - a subtle moving gradient border.
visual_enhancers.noise_texture: Add a subtle noise texture to the Slate-900 backgrounds to avoid flatness.

JobCard.style: Row style with hover reveal. Left: Company Logo. Center: Role & Wage Range. Right: 'Apply' pill.
JobCard.interaction: On hover, expand slightly to show 'Visa History' stats.

WageChart.style: Minimalist. Hide grid lines. Use custom tooltips with glass effect.

SearchBar.style: Massive, floating, centered. Height: h-16. Shadow: shadow-2xl. Rounded-full.

instructions_to_main_agent: Use .jsx extension for all React files.
Do NOT use TypeScript (.tsx) as the project is set up for JS.
Implement the 'Bento' grid for the landing page stats section.
Use 'Manrope' font for all headings. Import it in index.css.
Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
Use Shadcn UI components for complex interactions (Select, Dialog, Popover) but style them with the 'Electric Teal' accent.
For the Wage Level visualization, use Recharts. Create a component 'WageLevelChart.jsx'.
The 'Save Job' feature should use a heart icon that animates on click.
Authentication pages (Login/Register) should use a split layout: Left side form, Right side 'Testimonial/Art' image.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
